q: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
h:
“Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage. ” —
Lao Tzu

q: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
h:
“Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.” —
Rumi

q: The idea of ourselves is our escape from the fact of what we really are.
h:
“The idea of ourselves is our escape from the fact of what we really are.” —
Jiddu Krishnamurti

q: To perceive is to suffer.
h:
“To perceive is to suffer.” —
Aristotle

q: If you have to be in a soap opera try not to be cast in the worst role.
h:
“If you have to be in a soap opera try not to be cast in the worst role.” —
Judy Garland

q: You are today where your thoughts have brought you.
h:
“You are today where your thoughts have brought you.” —
James Allen

q: When you want something in life, you just gotta reach out and grab it.
h:
“When you want something in life, you just gotta reach out and grab it.” —
Christopher McCandless

q: Bloom where you are planted!
h:
“Bloom where you are planted!” —
Mary Engelbreit

q: Fallacies do not cease to be fallacies because they become fashions.
h:
“Fallacies do not cease to be fallacies because they become fashions.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

q: Leadership is solving problems
h:
“Leadership is solving problems” —
Colin Powell

q: We will now discuss in a little more detail the Struggle for Existence.
h:
“We will now discuss in a little more detail the Struggle for Existence.” —
Charles Darwin

q: To the world you may be one person; but to one person you may be the world.
h:
“To the world you may be one person; but to one person you may be the world.” —
Dr. Seuss

q: Life is a succession of lessons, which must be lived to be understood.
h:
“Life is a succession of lessons, which must be lived to be understood.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson

q: Everything you can imagine is real.
h:
“Everything you can imagine is real.” —
Pablo Picasso

q: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
h:
“Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

q: Invisible things are the only realities.
h:
“Invisible things are the only realities.” —
Edgar Allan Poe

q: Formal education will make you a living, self-education will make you a fortune.
h:
“Formal education will make you a living, self-education will make you a fortune.” —
Jim Rohn

q: If you can handle rejection, you'll learn to get everything you want.
h:
“If you can handle rejection, you'll learn to get everything you want.” —
Tony Robbins

q: I have no methods; all I do is accept people as they are.
h:
“I have no methods; all I do is accept people as they are.” —
Joan Rivers

q: The unthankful heart discovers no mercies; but the thankful heart will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings.
h:
“The unthankful heart discovers no mercies; but the thankful heart will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings.” —
Henry Ward Beecher

q: There is nothing like looking if you want to find something.
h:
“There is nothing like looking if you want to find something.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

q: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
h:
“Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.” —
Kahlil Gibran

q: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
h:
“Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.” —
Michael Jordan

q: If you aim at nothing, you will hit it every time.
h:
“If you aim at nothing, you will hit it every time. ” —
Zig Ziglar

q: Study logic and math, because once you've mastered them, you won't fear any book.
h:
“Study logic and math, because once you've mastered them, you won't fear any book.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: Life has no limitations except the ones you make.
h:
“Life has no limitations except the ones you make.” —
Les Brown

q: The universe doesn't allow perfection.
h:
“The universe doesn't allow perfection.” —
Stephen Hawking
